about: 구현된 API 등록
title: ""
labels: ""
assignees: ""
---

```http
GET /api/campaigns/?api_key=12345678901234567890123456789012
```

## Request

| Parameter | Type     | Description                        | value |
| :-------- | :------- | :--------------------------------- | :---- |
| api_key   | `string` | **Required**. Your Gophish API key |       |

## Responses

```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data" : {
    
  }
}
```
